The Honors College is also a short walk from the Student Activities Center and convenience store, the Rutgers Student Center, Brower Commons Dining Hall, the College Avenue Gym, Health Services, and both Alexander and Zimmerli libraries. Also within convenient walking distance of downtown New Brunswick and Easton Avenue shops and restaurants.

Type of Residence Hall:  Apartments

 Average Room Size:  Varies 
 Availability:  Continuing Students 
 Contract Type:  Undergraduate Academic Year (Two Semesters 9-Month) 
 
 
 
 
 
 What's Nearby? 
 
 The Sojourner Truth Apartments  are situated above The Yard, a multi-use project by the New Brunswick Development Corporation (DEVCO). Featuring common areas, green spaces, and a video monitor, the Yard will also be home to select retailers and restaurants, including: Bubbleology, honeygrow, RU Hungry, Rutgers Mailroom, Krispy Pizza, Jersey Mike’s, and Starbucks. Residents of the  Sojourner Truth Apartments  also live right in the middle of Easton Avenue’s copious dining and shopping opportunities and are close to the New Brunswick train station, academic buildings, and the Barnes and Noble campus bookstore. 
 
 Features & Amenities 
 
 Air conditioning Vending machines Wifi throughout the building Fitness center (located on 2nd floor) Laundry facility Building main lounge Building study lounge Sky lounges on 14th floor with views of NYC skyline Floor lounge(s) Private bathroom in apartment Elevator Ramp leading into building an entranceway Automated building entrance doors
